title: Doom Patrol: Book Three
description: The Doom Patrol must face new challenges: the final fate of the Brotherhood of Dada, the rise of the unstoppable Candlemaker, Danny the Street meeting his cosmic destiny and Crazy Jane attempting to find her place in the world. Sound strange? Well, not as strange as the superhero team fighting them.This exciting continuation from author Grant Morrison picks up in Doom Patrol: Book Three, with art by Brian Bolland, Richard Case, Philip Bond, Ken Steacy, Sean Phillips and more.Collects Doom Patrol #51-63 and the legendary Doom Force Special #1.
author: Grant Morrison
